Class LuceneClassElasticsearchAnalyzerReference

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, AnalyzerReference

    public class LuceneClassElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
extends ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
    A reference to an analyzer that should be translated from a Lucene class.
    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere

      • isNormalizer

        public boolean isNormalizer(String fieldName)
        Parameters:
        fieldName - name of the field whose analyzer is to be inspected
        Returns:
        true if the analyzer for the field with the given name is a normalizer, false otherwise.

      • registerDefinitions

        public void registerDefinitions(String fieldName,
                                ElasticsearchAnalysisDefinitionRegistry definitionRegistry)
        Description copied from class: ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
        Register definitions that will be needed in order to add the field named fieldName to the Elasticsearch mapping.
        Specified by:
        registerDefinitions in class ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the field for which every referenced analysis definition should be registered.
        definitionRegistry - The registry to be populated (it may be empty).

      • initialize

        public void initialize(ElasticsearchAnalysisDefinitionRegistry definitionRegistry,
                       ElasticsearchAnalyzerDefinitionTranslator translator)
        Description copied from class: ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
        Initialize the internals of this reference, so that enough information will be available to execute RemoteAnalyzerReference.getAnalyzerName(String) and ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference.registerDefinitions(String, ElasticsearchAnalysisDefinitionRegistry).
        Specified by:
        initialize in class ElasticsearchAnalyzerReference
        Parameters:
        definitionRegistry - The registry holding all known analyzer definitions.
        translator - An ElasticsearchAnalyzerDefinitionTranslator.
